title: Letter Spacing
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Letter Spacing**

The spacing between a series of characters in a line or paragraph of set text; also known as [tracking](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tracking). Spacing can be [tight](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tight) or [loose](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Loose). Note: letter spacing is different from [kerning](http://web.archive.org/web/20150116050041/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Kern).
